name: SQD
description: SquidTG is a blockchain game built on the TON blockchain, with Inscription serving as its underlying technology. Currently integrated into Telegram, SquidTG offers players the opportunity to engage with the game directly within the Telegram App. The gameplay is designed in the style of an idle game, where the ultimate objective is to strategically hatch squids and generate profit by selling their eggs. $SQD is the governance token of the SquidTG Metaverse. It will determine the direction of SquidTGâ€™s games, the development path of the SquidTG Metaverse, and, most importantly, accelerate the growth of the DeFi ecosystem on TON.
